org.frans.thesis.service
Interface CFTabletopServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CFTabletopService
@BusInterface(name="org.alljoyn.bus.samples.simple.SimpleInterface")
public interface CFTabletopServiceInterface

The interface that forms the communication gateway between the tabeltop and mobile devices. It contains method that connected mobile devices can call.

Method Summary
 boolean attach(java.lang.String name)
          A method that is called when a new mobile device has connected.
 boolean detach(java.lang.String name)
          A method to indicate a mobile device is closing its connection to the tabletop.
 java.lang.String getFileToPublish(java.lang.String clientName)
          Returns the path of an image that has to be published on facebook.
 byte[] getNextOutgoingFileBuffer(java.lang.String clientName)
          Returns the next piece of a file that is being sent to a client with a given name.
 int getStatus(java.lang.String name)
          Returns the status of a client with a given name.
 boolean receivePieceOfFile(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String name, byte[] buf, boolean lastPiece)
          A method to send a piece of a file from a mobile device to the tabletop.
 boolean setIdle(java.lang.String name)
          Sets the status of the mobile device with a given name to IDLE.
 

Method Detail

attach

@BusMethod
boolean attach(java.lang.String name)
               throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
A method that is called when a new mobile device has connected.

Parameters:
name - The name of the new device. This name must be unique, so there can be no other devices that has already been connected with the same name.
Returns:
True if the name of the new device was accepted. False if the name wasn't accepted.
Throws:
org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

detach

@BusMethod
boolean detach(java.lang.String name)
               throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
A method to indicate a mobile device is closing its connection to the tabletop.

Parameters:
name - The name of the client that is going to close the connection.
Returns:
True if the transaction succeeded.
Throws:
org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

getFileToPublish

@BusMethod
java.lang.String getFileToPublish(java.lang.String clientName)
Returns the path of an image that has to be published on facebook.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client that has to publish.
Returns:
True if the transaction succeeded and vice versa.

getNextOutgoingFileBuffer

@BusMethod
byte[] getNextOutgoingFileBuffer(java.lang.String clientName)
Returns the next piece of a file that is being sent to a client with a given name.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client that is requesting the next piece of the file.
Returns:
The next piece of the file as an array of bytes. Returns an array with length 1 if all data has been sent.

getStatus

@BusMethod
int getStatus(java.lang.String name)
              throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
Returns the status of a client with a given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the client of which the status is requested.
Returns:
0 = idle (nothing has to happen) 1 = 2 = 3 = 4 =
Throws:
org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

receivePieceOfFile

@BusMethod
boolean receivePieceOfFile(java.lang.String path,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     byte[] buf,
                                     boolean lastPiece)
                           throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
A method to send a piece of a file from a mobile device to the tabletop. On the tabletop the piece is joined with the rest of the file.

Parameters:
path - The orinal path of the file in the filesystem of the mobile device.
name - The name of the client that sends the file.
buf - The array of bytes that is being sent.
lastPiece - A boolean that indicates whether its the last piece. True indicates it is and vice versa.
Returns:
True if the transaction succeeded.
Throws:
org.alljoyn.bus.BusException

setIdle

@BusMethod
boolean setIdle(java.lang.String name)
                throws org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
Sets the status of the mobile device with a given name to IDLE.

Parameters:
name - The name of the device of which the status has to be set to IDLE.
Returns:
True if the transaction succeeded and vice versa.
Throws:
org.alljoyn.bus.BusException
